name: creative-studio-saas
description: A comprehensive SaaS platform for creative professionals in Egypt.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/index.html && cp public/favicon.svg dist/favicon.svg && cp public/favicon.ico dist/favicon.ico && tailwindcss -i src/input.css -o dist/output.css --minify && esbuild src/index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/bundle.js --jsx=automatic --loader:.ts=tsx --format=esm --minify
